tool_description: Simple reliable API for current and historical foreign exchange (forex) currency rates.
name: Currency Conversion and Exchange Rates
title: Currency Conversion and Exchange Rates

api_list.name: Recent Exchange Rates
api_list.description: Retrieve the latest exchange rate data. Refresh rate will depend on your subscription: updated every 60 minutes, every 10 minutes or every 60 seconds.

optional_parameters.name: from
optional_parameters.description: Three-letter currency code of the currency would would like to convert from. This currency will be converted into the code of the currency provided in the `to` parameter

optional_parameters.name: to
optional_parameters.description: A comma-separated list of currency codes to convert the `from` parameter into.

api_list.name: Historical Exchange Rates
api_list.description: Retrieve historical exchange rate data. Data is available for most currencies all the way back to the year of 1999.

required_parameters.name: date
required_parameters.description: The date to retrieve the historical exchange rates from.

optional_parameters.name: from
optional_parameters.description: Three-letter currency code of the currency would would like to convert from. This currency will be converted into the code of the currency provided in the `to` parameter

optional_parameters.name: to
optional_parameters.description: A comma-separated list of currency codes to convert the `from` parameter into.

api_list.name: Convert
api_list.description: In addition to providing converstion rates, our API provides a dedicated endpoint to easily do conversion on a specific amount of the currency.

required_parameters.name: to
required_parameters.description: The three-letter currency code of the currency you would like to convert to.

required_parameters.name: from
required_parameters.description: The three-letter currency code of the currency you would like to convert from.

optional_parameters.name: date
optional_parameters.description: Optionally, provide a specific date (format YYYY-MM-DD) to use historical rates for this conversion.

api_list.name: Symbols
api_list.description: Retrieve a list of all currently available currency symbols
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://currency-conversion-and-exchange-rates.p.rapidapi.com/symbols"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "currency-conversion-and-exchange-rates.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://currency-conversion-and-exchange-rates.p.rapidapi.com/symbols"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "currency-conversion-and-exchange-rates.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Time-Series Endpoint
api_list.description:
Retrieve historical rates between two specified dates.

`Maximum of 365 day time range`

optional_parameters.name: from
optional_parameters.description: Three-letter currency code of the currency would would like to convert from. This currency will be converted into the code of the currency provided in the `to` parameter

optional_parameters.name: to
optional_parameters.description: A comma-separated list of currency codes to convert the `from` parameter into.
